entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 01:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -24.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:58 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:58 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:58 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
